title: Gold prices fall 3% as Trump expected to announce Kevin Warsh as Fed chair pick
title_zh: 特朗普预计将宣布凯文·沃什(Kevin Warsh)当选美联储主席，金价下跌3%
summary: Gold prices slid after reports that US president Donald Trump is expected to nominate Kevin Warsh as the next chair of the Federal Reserve.
summary_zh: 有报道称美国总统唐纳德·特朗普预计将提名凯文·沃什为下一任美联储主席，金价下跌。

title: Trending tickers: Apple, Microsoft, Sandisk, Caterpillar and AstraZeneca
summary: The latest investor updates on stocks that are trending on Friday
summary_zh: 投资者对周五趋势股票的最新更新

title: Exclusive-China conditionally approves DeepSeek to buy Nvidia's H200 chips - sources
title_zh: 独家-中国有条件批准 DeepSeek 购买 Nvidia 的 H200 芯片 - 消息人士
summary: By Fanny Potkin SINGAPORE, Jan 30 (Reuters) - China has given its top AI startup DeepSeek approval to buy Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips with regulatory conditions that are still being
summary_zh: 路透新加坡 1 月 30 日 - 中国已批准其顶级人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 购买 Nvidia 的 H200 人工智能芯片，监管条件仍在审查中

title: China conditionally approves DeepSeek to buy Nvidia's H200 chips, sources say
title_zh: 消息人士称，中国有条件批准 DeepSeek 购买 Nvidia 的 H200 芯片
summary: China has given its top AI startup DeepSeek approval to buy Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips with regulatory conditions that ​are still being finalised, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
summary_zh: 两位知情人士告诉路透社，中国已批准其顶级人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 购买 Nvidia 的 H200 人工智能芯片，监管条件仍在敲定中。

title: SpaceX in merger talks with other Musk companies ahead of IPO
title_zh: SpaceX 在 IPO 前与其他马斯克公司进行合并谈判
summary: STORY: SpaceX is exploring deals with other companies helmed by Elon Musk.The rocket maker is in discussions to merge with artificial intelligence company xAI ahead of a blockbuster public offering planned for this year.The combination would bring Musk’s rockets, Starlink...
summary_zh: 故事：SpaceX 正在探索与埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 掌舵的其他公司进行交易。这家火箭制造商正在讨论与人工智能公司 xAI 合并，并计划在今年进行大规模公开募股。此次合并将带来马斯克的火箭、星链……

title: Apple to prioritize premium iPhone launches in 2026 amid memory crunch, Nikkei Asia reports
title_zh: 据日经亚洲报道，由于内存短缺，苹果将在 2026 年优先推出高端 iPhone
summary: Apple is prioritizing production and shipment of its three highest-end iPhone models for 2026 while ​delaying the rollout of its standard model due to ‌a marketing strategy shift and supply-chain constraints, Nikkei Asia reported on Friday, citing ‌four people with knowledge o...
summary_zh: 据《日经亚洲》周五援引四名知情人士的话报道，苹果将优先考虑 2026 年三款最高端 iPhone 机型的生产和出货，同时由于营销策略转变和供应链限制而推迟标准机型的推出。

title: Barclays expands startups platform to add market access
title_zh: 巴克莱扩大初创公司平台以增加市场准入
summary: Barclays is trying to fix one of the biggest issues for early-stage startups: inefficient fundraising and limited access to customers.
summary_zh: 巴克莱银行正试图解决早期初创企业面临的最大问题之一：融资效率低下和接触客户的机会有限。

title: Horticulturists told us our seeds business 'is not what people want, love'
title_zh: 园艺师告诉我们，我们的种子业务“不是人们想要的，亲爱的”
summary: She Grows Veg founders have taken an online community of female veg growers and turned it into a Chelsea Flower Show-winning, heirloom seed business.
summary_zh: She Grows Veg 的创始人将一个女性蔬菜种植者的在线社区变成了切尔西花卉展获奖的传家宝种子业务。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures slide as Trump's Fed pick, Apple earnings take focus
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克期货因特朗普的美联储选择而下滑，苹果公司的盈利成为焦点
summary: Major gauges are set to end the week higher with earnings and the Fed holding investor attention.
summary_zh: 随着企业财报和美联储吸引投资者的注意力，主要指标预计本周将走高。
